document.full_text: google announced a new social networking tool, even as it agreed to a deal with the f.t.c. to pay a price for privacy blunders it made with a past effort.
document.title: google unveils new social tool as it settles privacy case
lines_and_colors: google announced a new social networking tool, even as it agreed to a deal with the f.t.c. to pay a price for privacy blunders it made with a past effort.
